text: Anderson Peak is a mountain on the Mount San Gorgonio crestline in Southern California's San Gorgonio Wilderness, which is part of the San Bernardino National Forest. It is from Jepson Peak. Although not above the tree line, snow tends to cover the crest from the northern hemisphere early winter until late spring. == References == == External links == * Category:Mountains of San Bernardino County, California Category:Mountains of Southern California
title: Anderson Peak (San Bernardino Mountains)
